Articles.Content: Ladies and gentlemen, I have uncovered a conspiracy that transcends the bonds of mortal matter and uncovered that Green Iron Crown will one day return. The prophecy states that there will be a war, and the victor will reign over The Forum for all time. The war has apparently come now, the sides are amassing their armies faster than ever before. We must fight now!
Sorry, guys. GIC was a goof that turned into a forum game, but then ran its course and will not return.
